name: py-pickle5

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
This package backports all features and APIs added in the pickle module
in Python 3.8.3, including the PEP 574 additions. It should work with
Python 3.5, 3.6 and 3.7.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependent_to.name: py-ray
dependent_to.description:
Ray provides a simple, universal API for building distributed
applications.

dependent_to.name: py-modin
dependent_to.description: Modin: Make your pandas code run faster by changing one line of code.
